title: Coherence-Gradient Chaos Model — Reproducibility Package
description: Minimal, self-contained Python code to explore the coherence-gradient chaos framework introduced in: Valamontes, A., "Chaos as a Coherence–Gradient Phenomenon: A DLSFH–SGCV–MC Analysis" (manuscript). The package implements a three-node VID chain, linearized ∞-tensor propagator, operator-norm and spectral-radius criteria, and numerical estimation of the coherence-gradient Lyapunov exponent λ_CG. It is explicitly model-dependent and designed as a reproducibility companion to the manuscript.

related_identifiers.identifier: Chaos as a Coherence–Gradient Phenomenon: A DLSFH–SGCV–MC Analysis (manuscript)

notes: This archive accompanies the coherence-gradient chaos framework and is designed for numerical experiments on toy VID subgraphs and operator-norm-based instability criteria.
